title: 'accented glyph' feature not supported in PDF Lib
content:
A web developer that is using a PS OT font I have created is getting a message from PDFLib ( [http://www.pdflib.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420101516/http:/www.pdflib.com/ "http://www.pdflib.com/")) stating that the accented glyp feature is not supported.  
PDFLib does not support contextual alternates either, but it does not error with this feature.

how to procede?
author: miles
